member.name: P:Sudoku.CommandLine.Strings.Resources._Usage_Format_1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Formats the specified grid, using the string "0" as the format one, which means the grid only displays the given cells, modifiables are treated as the empty ones, and all empty cells will be displayed as a zero character '0'..
